channel.title: BBQ on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in BBQ on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Turnagain Arm Pit BBQ
item.description: Summary This is a semi-random shack off the highway about 10+ miles away from Girdwood. The fried chicharron and fried okra was really good. The fried ribs was had a slight crust to it with a strong glaze. I thought this was just OK. The main dish was one of those platters that had St Louis ribs, chicken thighs, and sausage. You know something is up when the coleslaw was more memorable.
